chunks.cleaned_english_translation: The Lord God showed me this: a basket of summer fruit. And the Lord said, "What do you see, Amos?" And I replied, "A basket of summer fruit." (At this point, all the copies we had access to are missing Haymo's words in chapters 8 and 9.)
chunks.original_latin:
Haec ostendit mihi Dominus Deus, et ecce uncinus
pomorum. Et dixit Dominus, Quid tu vides,
Amos? et dixi, Uncinum pomorum. (Hoc in loco exemplaria omnia, quorum nobis quidem
copia fuit, desiderant verba Haymonis, in capp. VIII et IX.)
